elements.name: Flight with no watch list match

steps.name: a flight is added with a name that is not on the watch list
the flight is displayed on the flight list page
the flight is not checked in the watch list column

elements.name: Flight with watch list match

steps.name: a flight is added with a name that is on the watch list
the flight is displayed on the flight list page
the flight is checked in the watch list column

elements.name: Flight with watch list match, data driven

steps.name: a flight is added with first name "Reinhold" and last name "Bogner"
a watch list entry is added with first name "Reinhold" and last name "Bogner"
the flight is displayed on the flight list page
the flight with first name "Reinhold" and last name "Bogner" is checked in the watch list column

name: Automatic Highlighting
description:
For the security of airline transportation, any person on the watch list
  that books a flight should be highlighted for easy identification.

name: Destinations Feature
description: To increase sales, advertise popular destinations with images.

steps.name: I navigate to the login page

elements.name: Blank username, blank password

steps.name: I login with a blank username field and a blank password field
a validation message stating that the username field is required is displayed
a validation message stating that the password field is required is displayed
I navigate to the login page

elements.name: Valid username, valid password

steps.name: I login with a valid username field and a valid password field
I am redirected to the flights page
I navigate to the login page
